title: Wait a second? "Starlight"? "Cosmic?"
body:
I thought Taric was the Gem Knight not the Star Knight

whats with all the celestial terminology, i dont see how Gems have anything to do with the new Taric except his fashion sense

replies.body: Taric is the Targon aspect of "the protector," meaning that much of his power is now celestial in nature. Besides, in his old lore he was from space anyways, so technically this fits new AND old Taric.

agreed

would prefer gemmy names, not star ones
Wasn't the crown that controlled {{champion:136}} made of special gems?
